text: Na oguṇṭhito antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na oguṇṭhito antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 23. I will not go with my head covered in inhabited areas: a training to be observed.
๒๓. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่คลุม (ศีรษะ) ไปในละแวกบ้าน”
23. I shall not go with head covered in inhabited areas: this is a training to be done.
